meanings.definition: An outer garment covering the body from the waist to the ankles, with a separate part for each leg.
meanings.sent1: I wear my pants every day to school.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of pants for the party.
meanings.sent3: The pants were so big, they looked like a tent!
meanings.sent4: His words hit me like a punch in the pants.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pants stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: To breathe with short, quick breaths, as after exertion or from excitement.
meanings.sent2: The dog pants happily after playing fetch.
meanings.sent3: I tried to sing, but all that came out was pants!
meanings.sent4: The engine pants as it struggles up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The exhausted hiker pants for breath at the summit.
